name: Ground water (amount per unit area)
description: Amount of water present beneath the ground surface per unit area.

name: Lake area
description: Area extent of the surface of a lake.

name: Lake level
description: Map of the height of the lake surface.

name: River discharge
description: Volume of water flowing through a river per unit of time.

name: Coastlines
description: Location of coastlines (Lat/Long).

name: Land cover
description: Processed from land surface imagery by assigning identified cluster(s) within a given area to specific classes of objects - Accuracy expressed as number of classes. Actually [ classes-1 ] is used, so that smaller figure corresponds to better performance, as usual.

name: Land surface topography
description: Map of land surface heights.

name: Wetland extent
description: Fraction of an area flood by water.

name: Soil type
description: Result of the classification of different types of soil within an area - Accuracy expressed as inverse of the number of classes, so that smaller figures correspond to better performance.

name: Fire fractional cover
description: Fraction of a land area where fire is occurring.

name: Fire radiative power
description: Power radiated by the fire occurring within an area.

name: Fire temperature
description: Temperature of the fire occurring within an area.

name: Land surface temperature
description: Temperature of the apparent surface of land (bare soil or vegetation).

name: Lake Surface Temperature
description: Temperature of the lake surface.

name: CO2 flux
description: Flux of carbon dioxide from the surface to the atmosphere

name: Biomass
description: Total amount of vegetation in a reference area

name: Fraction of vegetated land
description: Fraction of a land area where vegetation is present.

name: Leaf Area Index (LAI)
description: LAI (Leaf Area Index, LAI) is the total one-sided area of photosynthetic tissue per unit ground surface area.

name: Normalised Difference Vegetation Index (NDVI)
description: Difference between maximum (in NIR) and minimum (around the Red) vegetation reflectance, normalised to the summation. Representative of total biomass, supportive for computing LAI if not directly measured.

name: Vegetation type
description: Result of the classification of different types of vegetation within a vegetated area - Accuracy expressed as inverse of the number of classes, so that smaller figures correspond to better performance.

name: Evaporation
description: Quantity of water evaporated from the soil and plants when the ground is at its natural moisture content.

name: Soil moisture (in the roots region)
description: Sub-soil 3D field of the fractional content of water in a volume of wet soil. Typically, in a layer from the surface down to approximately 3m.

name: Soil moisture at surface
description: Fractional content of water in a volume of wet soil. Surface layer (upper few centimetres).

name: Fraction of Absorbed PAR (FAPAR)
description: Fraction of PAR absorbed by vegetation (land or marine) for photosynthesis processes (generally around the 'red' frequencies).

name: Photosynthetically Active Radiation (PAR)
description: Flux of downwelling photons of wavelength 400-700 nm.

name: Soil temperature
description: The standard depths for soil temperature measurements are 5, 10, 20, 50 and 100 cm below the surface; additional depths may be included. The site for such measurements should be a level plot of bare ground (about 75 cm^2 ) and typical of the surrounding soil for which information is required.

name: Glacier motion
description: Velocity of the ice measured at the surface of a glacier.

name: Glacier topography
description: Map of the height of the glacier surface.

name: Ice sheet topography
description: Map of ice sheet height over land.

name: Depth of snowfall
description: The vertical depth of freshly fallen snow that has accumulated during a specific period.

name: Snow cover extent
description: The area of snow-covered ground, ice, or firn based on the fractional threshold used to define presence of snow.

name: Snow depth
description: Vertical distance from the snow surface to a stated reference level.

name: Snow surface state
description: Binary product (dry or wet) expressing the presence of liquid water at the surface of the snow cover.

name: Water equivalent of snow cover
description: The vertical depth of the water that would be obtained if the snow cover melted completely, which equates to the snow-cover mass per unit area.

name: Presence of snow
description: A binary observation of the presence of snow cover at the measurement location.

name: Water equivalent of snowfall
description: Vertical depth of the water that would be obtained if the freshly fallen snow melted completely, which equates to the new snow mass per unit area.

name: Glacier mass balance at a point
description: The result of all processes adding and removing mass from the glacier at a point on its surface, expressed over a stated period of time

name: Glacier-wide mass balance
description: The result of all processes adding and removing mass from the glacier at its surface, expressed over a stated period of time and integrated over the entire glacier area

name: Surface accumulation at a point
description: The mass added to the glacier at a point on its surface expressed over a stated period of time.

name: Surface ablation at a point
description: The mass removed from the glacier at a point on its surface expressed over a stated period of time.

name: Glacier area
description: Area enclosed by the projection of the glacier outline onto the surface of an ellipsoid approximating the surface of the Earth or onto a planar horizontal approximation to that ellipsoid. The glacier area excludes nunataks but includes debris-covered parts of the glacier. The glacier outline separates the glacier from unglacierized terrain and from contiguous glaciers.
